title: Stone Serif Semibold Condensed
content:
I can't find this particular style of this font.  
Anyone has any more info, thx
author: luka

comments.content: According to [Stone](http://web.archive.org/web/20130412134933/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/html_pages/ITCStoneOverview.html) himself there is no Stone Serif Condensed. There is certainly an [ITC Stone Serif Semibold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130412134933/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=ITC.110808.3.6).
Don't artificially condense it! It will look awful. Use it as is or find a condensed face that was drawn that way.

Stone Print seems to be a narrower version, you could compare [Stone Print SemiBold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130412134933/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/stone-print/semibold/), and see if that suits your needs.
